section.title: Bleeding edge
section.para: The source code for &kx; may be browsed at sourceforge.net/p/kaarpux/code/ref/master~/. This git repository represents the bleeding edge of the &kx; development.
The git repository may be cloned with git clone git://git.code.sf.net/p/kaarpux/code kaarpux

note.para: When changes are made to &kx; they are usually first tested on top of an already installed &kx; system, and then commited to the git repository. Such changes may break a complete build from scratch. However, it will help the &kx; development if you try out the bleeding edge and report any problems.

section.title: Stable version
section.para: The latest stable version of &kx; may be downloaded as a tarball. Earlier versions of &kx; may be found at sourceforge.net/projects/kaarpux/files/.
